sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import './index.css' class PlayerDetails extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super() this.state = { playerInfo: [], playerStats: [], playerShoots: null, playerScoring: [], playerSkating: [], playerPenalties: [], } } async componentDidMount() { let { id } = this.props.match.params const url = "https://api.mysportsfeeds.com/v2.1/pull/nhl/current/player_stats_totals.json?player=" + id const response = await fetch(url, { headers: new Headers({ 'Authorization': 'Basic '+btoa('1e3895c7-87b5-4460-9249-8fc296:MYSPORTSFEEDS'), }), }); const data = await response.json(); this.setState({playerInfo: data.playerStatsTotals[0].player, playerStats: data.playerStatsTotals[0].stats}) this.setState({playerShoots: this.state.playerInfo.handedness.shoots}) this.setState({playerScoring: this.state.playerStats.scoring}) } render() { let player = this.state.playerInfo let stats = this.state.playerStats let scoring = this.state.playerScoring return (

{player.firstName} {player.lastName} (#{player.jerseyNumber})

{player.primaryPosition} | {player.height} | {player.weight} lb

Born: {player.birthDate}

Birthplace: {player.birthCity}, {player.birthCountry}

Shoots: {this.state.playerShoots}

Season GP G A P
2020-2021 {stats.gamesPlayed} {scoring.goals} {scoring.assists} {scoring.points}
) } } export default PlayerDetails
